attributes.additional_details: The Tory party is PLAINLY incapable of governing. They've had many, many chances within the last 3 years to show any vestige of competence whatsoever, but have fallen tragically short at every single opportunity. It's time for the British public to have a voice.
attributes.background: Due to the rank and unprecedented incompetence of the current government, we need to call a general election, to allow those more capable of governing to be given the opportunity to do so.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/619781
